entry.title: WIND WARNING , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:56 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: SW 54 km/h gust 69 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to a few flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 9:07 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:07 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 9:07 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
